title: D5 Mid Main LF team

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Heya, I am a D5 mid laner looking for a semi-competitive + team. I am 15 and have been playing since Season 3. I used to main adc but I started not performing very well so I decided to try other roles and I really liked mid so I started maining it. I mainly play mages but do know how to play assassins/fighters as well I'm just not as comfortable on them. I also really like things like Corki, Varus etc. I have very good mechanics for the most part and have great game knowledge but the one thing I don't do the best is decision making which is what I'm working on atm. 
I've played on a couple of semi-competitive/competitive teams in the past. I played on a team called Enclave which managed to get diamond in the 5s ladder and went for OCS. I also played on an NZGC team where we got 4th (I think). I've also played on others but they were mainly troll/inactive ones. I am online most of the time and I can play from 3pm - 12am+ (can adjust if need be) on weekdays and for a long time on weekends (9am-1am)  haha :P. If anyone wants to trial me or anything just add me on LoL. My IGN is Ryuku

replies.body: This guy is legit! Can highly recommend him to any serious team
